text: Tom Casperson (July 20, 1959 â€“ November 29, 2020) was an American politician. He was born in Escanaba, Michigan. He was a Republican member of the Michigan State Senate from 2011 to 2018. He was a member of the Michigan State House of Representatives from 2003 to 2008. Caperson died on November 29, 2020 from lung cancer in Escanaba at the age of 61.Former U.P. lawmaker Sen.
